overview: In 1985, in Japan, which was about to enter the bubble economy, there was a region where contradictions in the world seemed to gather.  Nishinari Ward, Osaka. Origins, prejudices, school violence, sloppy homes ...  There were many children who dreamed of a better tomorrow in a harsh environment, worried, suffered, and stubbornly sought their way of life.  A moving story that depicts the way of life of a real teacher, Kaba Masuo, who faced them and collided head-on.
title: Kaba
